ygData.subject: Finding friendly vendors in qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: I m an erudite enchanter and I can only find vendors in qeynos which say they look at me apprehensively or when I use the human illusion, they are indifferent.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm an erudite enchanter and I can only find vendors in qeynos which say they
look at me apprehensively or when I use the human illusion, they are
indifferent.

Back in erudin, I found vendors which were amicable to me.

Which mob can I kill to raise my faction with the qeynos merchants?

Thanks

Azboklin the enchanter

P.S. I've read on this list that alliance allows npc's who wouldn't
previously
talk to you, talk to you. I haven't tested it though.
